DOC.brief_summary: This study was designed to assess the pharmacokinetics of 2 doses of Red Grape Cells (RGC) containing resveratrol compared with a reference. RGC will be administered as single oral dose to fasting healthy volunteers. Plasma concentration of free resveratrol and total conjugates will be analyzed.
DOC.criteria: Ages 1855 years; BMI >/= 19 and </= 30 non smoking without history or evidence of significant cardiovascular, hepatic, renal, respiratory, gastrointestinal disease normal physical and laboratory examinations History or evidence of alcohol or drug abuse subjects receiving chronic medication unusual dietary habits or a recent change in body weight acute medical situation 48 hours prior to initiation of the study poor venous access Subjects participated in a trial or donated blood within 4 weeks before initiation of the study
